dt: {bc}a picture or diagram that helps make something clear or attractive
{bc}an example or instance that helps make something clear
{bc}the action of making {a_link|illustrious} or honored or distinguished

pt: {sc}instance{/sc} {sc}case{/sc} {sc}illustration{/sc} {sc}example{/sc} {sc}sample{/sc} {sc}specimen{/sc} mean something that exhibits distinguishing characteristics in its category. {sc}instance{/sc} applies to any individual person, act, or thing that may be offered to illustrate or explain.
{sc}case{/sc} is used to direct attention to a real or assumed occurrence or situation that is to be considered, studied, or dealt with.
{sc}illustration{/sc} applies to an instance offered as a means of clarifying or illuminating a general statement.
{sc}example{/sc} applies to a typical, representative, or illustrative instance or case.
{sc}sample{/sc} implies a part or unit taken at random from a larger whole and so presumed to be typical of its qualities.

pt.t: show us a {it}sample{/it} of your work

pt: {sc}specimen{/sc} applies to any example or sample whether representative or merely existent and available.

pt.t: one of the finest {it}specimens{/it} of the jeweler's art

shortdef: something that serves to illustrate: such as
a picture or diagram that helps make something clear or attractive
an example or instance that helps make something clear

dt.t: {it}By way of illustration{/it}, let us examine this poem.
